EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - TaaS - 2014.12.03.Email - Last Call Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Tomorrow: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Testers are constantly struggling with the same issues:
- Test Lab hardware and maintenance are too expensive - Desire to scale up your testing team quickly and providing fast access for remote teams - Need to access testing tool on different operating systems
Last chance to register for our webinar “Testing in the Cloud with Tosca”, where TaaS Product Owner, Michael Niessl, will be talking about the challenges with on-premise installations, and walk you through our new Cloud-Based Test Management Suite, Tosca-as-a-Service, including a live demo.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-taas-2014-12-03.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-taas-2014-12-03.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Wed Dec 3, 2014 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. CET
Michael Niesl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
Jessica Chao Product Marketing Specialist Tricentis
